text:
@realDonaldTrump The tRump-me-me-me plan is taking a sledgehammer to facts and our nation's safety by having COVID-19 numbers routed through the White House (to hide them), instead of going directly to the CDC.

You'll pay for your crimes, Donald.
Tick Tock.
The American people have had enough.
